fullText: Glenda Jackson makes a commanding return to Broadway after a 25-year absence in Edward Albee's Pulitzer Prize-winning drama, alongside Laurie Metcalf and Alison Pill in a production that finds fresh nuance in this searching examination of a life viewed from three vantage points.
